function_description: Edit task description within a card
initial_state: The user is logged into the 4ga Boards application, has opened the card view for a specific card, and is viewing the card's details.
steps: Locate the input field for the task description within the card view.
Click on the input field to activate it for editing.
Modify the text to update the task description.
Save the changes to the task description.
expected_state: The task description within the card is updated to reflect the new text entered by the user.
